entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late this evening. Rain showers or a few flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
